title: What I miss in League of Legends
body:
I miss that feeling where you just saved enough IP to buy a champion in League, that feeling when you just can't decide between two champions or more.

I have 97% of the champions now and the rest I have little to no interest in, mind you I'm not boasting about having most of the champions, I believe many others have all of them anyway, but eh, it's just a feeling that I miss, the feeling of being indecisive about which champion to get...

-- gets 3150IP+
-- "hmm Pantheon or Akali"
-- thinks for hours and hours
-- eventually accumulates more IP
-- gets close to 4800IP
-- "ooh close to 4800 better decide on which 4800 champ to get"

Those were the days man

YouTube has some great hits (if you get what I mean xD should've been misses visually)

As I only ARAM, I often get idk, 30k+ ip sitting there doing nothing. I don't buy champs unless I want to roll them in ARAM.

Sometimes, I'll get a free-week champ, have a really good game, buy the champ, and then discover that good game was a fluke. xD
Many regerets to be had.

More recently, I'll unlock champs for free skins via hextech crafting. That has had mixed results too.
Oh look, a cool Gnar skin for free, /buys Gnar.
First (and only) game with Gnar (against a bunch of high golds/plats/and a diamond, I am unranked): 0/15/*
Regrets to be had.

And most recently, I blew all my ip on chromas, and unlocking champs+chromas for them.

I have maybe half the champs, or a little more. Many of them 6300's though.
I also have at least a dozen rune pages (all bought with ip), and an extensive collection of runes (I binged on rune buying a couple of years ago when they changed a bunch and all runes were discounted for a month or two).
Now, I'm not a freeloader, I have bought rp several times, but only to spend on skins, and only on skin sales.

And I currently find myself at around 300 ip, first time under 10k in a year or two, due to all these chromas (and unlocking champs for chromas).


I see so many people on these forums bitching... "fk u rito", "game is shit", etc.
If you don't like it, don't play it. It is not rocket surgery.
I enjoy ARAM, I don't care for the regular game anymore (haven't played a single game on the rift in at least 18 months, maybe a couple on twisted treeline, but that would be over a year ago too).
Instead of bitching, these people need to go get a life. Many of us enjoy what rito gives (for free), I still find the game very entertaining after having played since season 2.

[edit] Got my S grade on Kog this morning, SKT1 Vayne skin shard tyvm.
